title: Pirelli P Zero Race Tub SL sews up ever-lighter tubular for World Tour pro road racing
content:
While tubeless continues to make inroads into pro racing, the new Pirelli P Zero Race Tub SL tire shows that there’s still performance to be gained from gluing on tubulars. Combining Pirelli’s latest SmartEvo rubber compound and a new TPU tube inside, Pirelli claims significant weight savings that will help their World Tour pros over […]
